statements: DELETE FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE landfill_location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND landfill_location = 'Landfill Alpha';
DELETE FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE decay_rate > 3.00 AND measurement_unit = 'days';
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND landfill_id = 1 AND measurement_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates WHERE waste_type = 'Food Waste' AND decay_rate > 0.1 AND landfill_id = 123 AND measurement_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LandfillLocations WHERE location_name = 'Riverside Landfill'
DELETE FROM landfill_location WHERE location_name = 'Landfill A';
DELETE FROM waste_collection WHERE landfill_id = 3 AND collection_date < '2022-07-01';
